# magic(fallback:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an effect preferring MagicReplace and a configured ReplaceEffect if MagicReplace is not possible.

## Declaration

```swift
func magic(fallback: ReplaceSymbolEffect) -> ReplaceSymbolEffect.MagicReplace
```
title: magic(fallback:)
